DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if MR-guided laser ablation can effectively treat prostate tumor recurrences.
DOC.brief_title: MR-Guided Laser Ablation of Prostate Bed Recurrences
DOC.criteria: Patients with "biopsy proven" soft tissue tumor recurrences of prostate fossa referred to Urology and/or Interventional Radiology for treatment.
